meanings.definition: A television show that features a set of characters in a humorous situation.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching sitcoms with my family after dinner.
meanings.sent2: Many people find sitcoms to be a great way to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent3: The sitcoms always make me laugh with their funny jokes and silly situations.
meanings.sent4: Watching sitcoms is like taking a break from reality and entering a world of laughter.
meanings.sent5: The characters in sitcoms feel like old friends, always there to brighten my day.

meanings.definition: The genre of television shows that feature a set of characters in a humorous situation.
meanings.sent1: Sitcoms have been a popular genre on television for many years.
meanings.sent2: Viewers often turn to sitcoms for a good laugh and some light-hearted entertainment.
meanings.sent3: I can't get enough of the sitcoms on TV; they always bring a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of stress, sitcoms provide a much-needed dose of humor and joy.
meanings.sent5: The sitcoms on air right now are some of the best I've seen in a long time.
